p: Electrolytes containing ZnCl 2 were prepared similarly by adding predried powdered ZnCl 2 (99.999%, Aldrich, dried at room temperature at 10 –2 mbar for ≥48 h) to the 12 CE electrolyte. The solution was stirred until all of the salt had completely dissolved. Higher temperatures were avoided to limit reactions between ZnCl 2 and the hydroxyl group of the choline.
